name: Vonjour, LLC
description: Developer of a customer communications platform designed to offer all-in-one system and text messaging services for modern businesses. The company's platform assists businesses to reach customers at the right time and connect them to agents through chat-based text message support, enabling businesses to manage all inbound customer queries in a team inbox with the context needed to write personalized replies and provide timely support.
